    • Method Detail

      • handle

        public void handle(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        Handles all of the mouse movement events. Moves the camera based on if the mouse is left or right of the center. This avoids moving the camera when the mouse is reset back since the mouse x coordinate will equal the center x coordinate (which is neither left or right).
        Specified by:
        handle in interface javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent>
        Parameters:
        event - All mouse motion events are automatically passed into this method.
